name: sorghastrum nutans
description: The silky, golden seedheads of Indiangrass impart a special beauty and drama to the prairie in autumn. Plant with Little BluestemÂ for a fabulous fall combination. This clumping tall grass makes a great companion for a wide range of prairie flowers, and as an accent grass. Sorghastrum nutans is a wonderful drought resistant meadow grass and a desirable native component in most eastern North American grasslands. Attractive to both wildlife and pollinators.
